title: Rinsing the mouth and nose together in wudu or separately? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: i've seen people making mother mother rinsing their mouth with different scoops then rinsing their noses with different scoops and i've seen others ranging the mouth and the nose in one scoop which one is correct and according to the sunnah the latter the sunnah is to get the water put half of it in your mouth and sniff the other half and blow your nose so one scoop for both some people might find this difficult there's no problem in separating them and allah knows best
